title: DigiLocker
description:
DigiLocker is a key initiative under Digital India, the Government of India's flagship program aimed at transforming India into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy. Targeted at the idea of paperless governance, DigiLocker is a platform for issuance and verification of documents & certificates in a digital way, thus eliminating the use of physical documents. The DigiLocker website can be accessed at https://digitallocker.gov.in/.  

You can now access your documents and certificates from your DigiLocker on your mobile devices.
descriptionHTML:
DigiLocker is a key initiative under Digital India, the Government of India's flagship program aimed at transforming India into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy. Targeted at the idea of paperless governance, DigiLocker is a platform for issuance and verification of documents & certificates in a digital way, thus eliminating the use of physical documents. The DigiLocker website can be accessed at https://digitallocker.gov.in/.

You can now access your documents and certificates from your DigiLocker on your mobile devices.
summary: DigiLocker  -  a simple and secure document wallet

developer.devId: National eGovernance Division, Government of India

developerAddress:
Digital India Corporation,
Government of India,
Electronics Niketan, 6, CGO Complex,

comments: Have been trying to upload RC for last 2 days. It wouldn't fetch the details and I am getting errors. These errors are - getting stuck on 'fetching', gateway timeout etc. I have also dropped an email using help the app only but so far I haven't received any response. The app is updated. Updated - I have done everything I was asked to do. The issues still persists.

Abysmal Experience. The whole team that worked on this app and it's damn interface should be fired. I've never seen an app this incompetent and bad at doing what it's meant to do. For example - I wanted to set data limit for individual members of my family plan, and this app keeps redirecting me between the same two pages OVER AND OVER AGAIN. And don't even get me started on the Support Chat Bot cuz it made me want to rip my hair out.

There are several shortcomings in it. It's not fetching updated documents, and if you haven't added your phone number in any document, it's not fetching that either. I've requested help from the DigiLocker support center multiple times, but they haven't made any improvements, just keep acknowledging the issue.

I am surprised to see 4.2 rating for this app. I have installed DigiLocker several times hoping the problems might have fixed. Disappointed and uninstalled everytime. Till this date the app keeps crashing everytime. It seems very easy to upload documents, but in reality its very difficult due to app crash everytime. I don't see any difference with or without DigiLocker !! I wish to change this rating in future if DigiLocker makes a difference. Untill then i am keeping unnecessary apps away.

DigiLocker by the National eGovernance Division is a phenomenal app that has simplified my document management like never before. It's secure, user-friendly, and eco-friendly! Storing and accessing my important documents digitally has never been easier. Plus, the government-backed authentication adds an extra layer of trust. This app has truly revolutionized how we manage our paperwork, reducing clutter and stress. It's a must-have for every Indian citizen.
